Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Barucci, M.A., A. Doressoundiram, D. Tholen, M. Fulchignoni, and M. Lazzarin, Spectrophotometric observations of Edgeworth-Kuiper belt objects, Icarus 142, 476-481, 1999.
Davies, J.K., D.J. Tholen and D.R. Ballantyne, Infrared observations of distant asteroids. In 'Completing the Inventory of the Solar System', ASP Conf. Proc. 107, 97, 1996.
Davies, J.K., N. McBride, and S.F. Green, Optical and infrared photometry of Kuiper belt object 1993 SC, Icarus, 125, 61, 1997.
Green, S.F., N. McBride, D.P. O'Ceallaigh, A. Fitzsimmons, I.P. Williams, and M.J. Irwin, Surface reflectance properties of distant solar system bodies, MNRAS 290, 186, 1997.
Jewitt, D.C. and J.X. Luu, Optical-infrared spectral diversity in the Kuiper belt, AJ, 115, 1667, 1998.
Luu, J.X. and D.C. Jewitt, Color diversity among the Centaurs and Kuiper belt objects, AJ, 112, 2310, 1996.
Tegler, S.C. and W. Romanishin, The extraordinary colors of trans- Neptunian objects 1994 TB and 1993 SC, Icarus, 126, 212, 1997.
Tegler, S.C. and W. Romanishin, Two distinct populations of Kuiper belt objects, Nature 392, 49-51, 1998.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Published colors of Trans-Neptunian objects through December 2001
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: Published colors of Trans-Neptunian objects through December 2001
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview =================
This data set is intended to include all published colors of trans-Neptunian objects published up through December 1999. Lightcurve data and spectra are not included here, but will be included in separate data sets.
Data ====
Data were collected from the published literature and include Johnson-Kron-Cousins color indices and one-sigma uncertainty values for twenty-four TNOs. Many objects have multiple entries indicating data have been reported by several groups. Details of the observations and data reduction are to be found in the individual papers.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Review ======
This data set underwent external peer review on June 1, 2000.
